howItWorks.title: How TripPals Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started with TripPals in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Set up your travel preferences, interests, and some basic personal information to help other travel buddies know more about you.

step2.title: Search & Discover
step2.description: Browse through trips based on destination, dates, budget, and travel style preferences, or from our suggestions.

step3.title: Connect & Chat
step3.description: A single click to join the chat rooms for related trips, talk with potential travel buddies, and plan your adventure together.

step4.title: Start Your Adventure
step4.description: Coordinate with your new travel buddies to finalize plans, discuss accommodations, and embark on your shared adventure.
